医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
通过获得新突变来分析进化和适应过程流感病毒通过获得新的突变不断地经历进化和适应的过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230729/Analyzing-process-of-evolution-and-adaptation-through-acquiring-new-mutations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230729/Analyzing-process-of-evolution-and-adaptation-through-acquiring-new-mutations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0ec023cf-a8cd-43c3-b6a6-8d26cda1345f Sat, 29 Jul 2023 00:05:42 -0400 Analyzing process of evolution and adaptation through acquiring new mutations
新生儿筛查会对囊性纤维化婴儿的短期和长期健康结果产生负面影响《儿科杂志》发表了科罗拉多州儿童医院肺部专家、科罗拉多大学儿科副教授 Stacey Martiniano 医学博士的手稿。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230729/Newborn-screening-negatively-effects-short-and-long-term-health-outcomes-in-infants-with-cystic-fibrosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230729/Newborn-screening-negatively-effects-short-and-long-term-health-outcomes-in-infants-with-cystic-太多纤维化.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=91b45ddf-eab2-4f48-bb7b-ee44e163e90a Sat, 29 Jul 2023 00:02:03 -0400 Newborn screening negatively effects short- and long-term health outcomes in infants with cystic fibrosis
新型无创疟疾检测不需要血液样本耶鲁大学公共卫生学院 (YSPH) 和 CytoAstra, LLC 的研究人员正在开发一种新型检测平台，可以为疟疾提供一种不需要血液样本的新型非侵入性检测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Novel-nonpressive-test-for-malaria-does-not-require-a-blood-sample.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Novel-nonpressive-test-for-malaria-does-not-require-a-blood-sample.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=49bd3c1e-4940-40af-ae7a-51ae1359d224 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 23:49:12 -0400 Novel noninvasive test for malaria does not require a blood sample
血液检测可能有助于识别有转甲状腺素蛋白淀粉样心肌病风险的患者由波士顿医学中心和哥伦比亚大学的医生领导的一项新的多中心研究发现，仅前白蛋白基因中存在遗传变异不足以诊断老年黑人患者的转甲状腺素蛋白淀粉样心肌病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Blood-test-may-help-identify-患者-at-risk-for-transthyretin-amyloid-cardiomyopathy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Blood-test-may-help-identify-患者-at-risk-for-transthyretin-amyloid-cardiomyopathy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fd7d59fa-932d-452e-94ec-9f1ee926e306 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 21:21:00 -0400 Blood test may help identify patients at risk for transthyretin amyloid cardiomyopathy
镉暴露会扰乱胎盘激素，损害胎儿发育与许多毒素一样，怀孕期间接触有毒金属镉会对胎儿发育产生不利影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Cadmium-exposure-disrupts-placental-hormones-harming-fetal-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Cadmium-exposure-disrupts-placental-hormones-harming-fetal-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7686f8c1-850b-4ab2-930c-a09142418280 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 21:15:00 -0400 Cadmium exposure disrupts placental hormones, harming fetal development
母乳中的微量营养素促进新生儿大脑发育塔夫茨大学美国农业部人类营养衰老研究中心 (HNRCA) 的科学家进行的一项新研究表明，人母乳中的微量营养素对新生儿大脑的发育具有显着益处，这一发现进一步阐明了营养与衰老之间的联系。大脑健康，并有助于改善在无法母乳喂养的情况下使用的婴儿配方奶粉。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Micro Nutrition-in-breast-milk-boosts-brain-development-in-newborns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Micro Nutrition-in-breast-milk-boosts-brain-development-in-newborns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2d8f7323-1815-403b-908e-5a70526c4630 Fri, 28 Jul 2023 21:09:00 -0400 Micronutrient in breast milk boosts brain development in newborns
顶尖精神病学家表示，NHS 需要大胆的解决方案才能生存无论是建立一个类似英格兰银行的机构来管理它，还是对错过预约的患者进行罚款，过去和现在的医疗保健领导人、政策制定者和从业者对于如何改善 NHS 都有着丰富的想法。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/NHS-needs-bold-solutions-to-survive-says-leading-psychiatrist.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/NHS-needs-bold-solutions-to-survive-says-leading-psychiatrist.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=05d3be23-bec6-4d1d-ab24-3d471f73094e Fri, 28 Jul 2023 21:03:00 -0400 NHS needs bold solutions to survive, says leading psychiatrist
可穿戴超声设备可以早期检测乳腺癌当乳腺癌在最早阶段被诊断出来时，生存率接近 100%。然而，对于晚期发现的肿瘤，这一比例下降至 25% 左右。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Wearable-ultrasound-device-could-detect-breast-cancer-in-early-stages.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Wearable-ultrasound-device-could-detect-breast-cancer-in-early-stages.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22cc11ce-cf24-4847-915b-8299d478557d Fri, 28 Jul 2023 21:01:00 -0400 Wearable ultrasound device could detect breast cancer in early stages
生物钟基因在记忆形成中发挥作用一种在调节一天 24 小时身体变化中发挥关键作用的基因也会影响记忆形成，使小鼠在白天比晚上更好地巩固记忆。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Circadian-clock-gene-plays-role-in-memory-formation.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Circadian-clock-gene-plays-role-in-memory-formation.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8ab7b84d-9b92-4385-aabf-3a3299fefa8a Fri, 28 Jul 2023 20:42:00 -0400 Circadian clock gene plays role in memory formation
干细胞为克罗恩病治疗带来新希望芝加哥 Ann & Robert H. Lurie 儿童医院的研究发现，直接注射源自手术期间丢弃的心脏组织的新生儿间充质干细胞，可以减轻克罗恩病样回肠炎小鼠模型的肠道炎症并促进伤口愈合以慢性肠道炎症和进行性组织损伤为特征。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Stem-cells-offer-new-hope-for-Crohns-disease-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230728/Stem-cells-offer-new-hope-for-Crohns-disease-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8a6e8b2b-396c-48c1-b149-9b8a66e33cde Fri, 28 Jul 2023 20:34:00 -0400 Stem cells offer new hope for Crohn's disease treatment
